page.description: You can add a button control to a component by clicking on the [Button] option in the Other Controls menu. The guides listed here describe how to make button controls appear and function in the way that you want.

description.p: The Button control has a JavaScript object that you can use to modify the button's appearance and behavior at run-time. Use the *[js:{dialog.object}.getControl()]* method to get the object for a button:
Once you have a pointer to the button, you can [change its appearance or behavior].
See [A5.Button] for a list of methods and properties available for the button object.
